text: M. W. Aruna Pradeep (also known as Manimel Wadu Aruna Pradeep) is the Chairman of Ambalangoda Urban Council.Ambalangoda Hails Army Commander ==Early childhood== Aruna who was educated at Nalanda College, Colombo is an Attorney at law by profession.Wife returns UC cash misappropriated by husbandPrincipal allowed bail ==References== * Council Ministers * Sculpturing a new set of Kolam masks commences * Ambalangoda hails Army Commander * Expands To Ambalangoda Category:Sri Lankan Buddhists Category:Living people Category:Sri Lanka Freedom Party politicians Category:United People's Freedom Alliance politicians Category:Alumni of Nalanda College, Colombo Category:Sinhalese politicians Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: M. W. Aruna Pradeep
